titles.title: Honoring the 250th anniversary of New York's St. Patrick's Day parade.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/10/2011--Introduced. Honors the 250th anniversary of the St. Patrick's Day parade in New York, New York. Recognizes the leadership of and participants in the parade and other St. Patrick's Day parades throughout the United States for their efforts to celebrate and honor St. Patrick, Ireland, and the history of Irish-Americans.
